songs: There's No One Crying Over Me Either by American Wrestlers
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The moon kids won the war
Snared a lonely passerby
To celebrate the electric chair
On a disappearing island

[Chorus 1]
But there's no one crying over me either

[Verse 2]
So lighten up the camera flood
Early on, the latest feeling
But I don't mind your idle mind
Much slower than a picture

[Chorus 2]
'cause there's no one crying over me either
Yeah, there's no one crying over me either

[Verse 3]
You stayed up late, my roaming shut-in
Don't belong, your luck is fleeting
To set aside a sunset for those
Skinny-shaded fuckwits

[Chorus 3]
But there's no one crying over them either
Like there's no one crying over me

[Verse 4]
I want it but I need it like the hole in my head
If the hip kids buy in
Put another hole in my head
Cool enough to always be dead
